test-suite.name: Azure Security Compliance Tests.Storage Account Security
test-suite.description: Azure Security Compliance Tests.Storage Account Security

test-case.description: All Storage Accounts should have HTTPS-only enabled
test-case.name: Azure Security Compliance Tests.Storage Account Security.All Storage Accounts should have HTTPS-only enabled

test-case.description: All Storage Accounts should have minimum TLS 1.2
test-case.name: Azure Security Compliance Tests.Storage Account Security.All Storage Accounts should have minimum TLS 1.2

test-case.description: All Storage Accounts should have Blob Public Access disabled
test-case.name: Azure Security Compliance Tests.Storage Account Security.All Storage Accounts should have Blob Public Access disabled

test-suite.name: Azure Security Compliance Tests.Key Vault Security
test-suite.description: Azure Security Compliance Tests.Key Vault Security

test-case.description: All Key Vaults should have Soft Delete enabled
test-case.name: Azure Security Compliance Tests.Key Vault Security.All Key Vaults should have Soft Delete enabled

test-case.description: All Key Vaults should have Purge Protection enabled in Production
test-case.name: Azure Security Compliance Tests.Key Vault Security.All Key Vaults should have Purge Protection enabled in Production

test-suite.name: Azure Security Compliance Tests.Web App Security
test-suite.description: Azure Security Compliance Tests.Web App Security

test-case.description: All Web Apps should have HTTPS-only enabled
test-case.name: Azure Security Compliance Tests.Web App Security.All Web Apps should have HTTPS-only enabled

test-case.description: All Web Apps should use minimum TLS 1.2
test-case.name: Azure Security Compliance Tests.Web App Security.All Web Apps should use minimum TLS 1.2

test-suite.name: Azure Security Compliance Tests.SQL Server Security
test-suite.description: Azure Security Compliance Tests.SQL Server Security

test-case.description: All SQL Servers should have Azure AD authentication enabled
test-case.name: Azure Security Compliance Tests.SQL Server Security.All SQL Servers should have Azure AD authentication enabled

test-case.description: All SQL Servers should have Auditing enabled
test-case.name: Azure Security Compliance Tests.SQL Server Security.All SQL Servers should have Auditing enabled
